Hello,

I'm using Heritrix 1.8 and I configured a profile based on
"decidin=
g-default".

I tried crawls with about 200 URL and max-toe-threads at 500 a=
nd it's
very slow, with an average of 25 active threads, 3 URI/s and 60 Kb/=
s.
The others ToeThreads are in status "ABOUT_TO_GET_URI".

There is also 1=
49 queues with 42 active and 107 exhausted.

I already reduced some 'waitin=
g' parameters of the Frontier like
delay-factor, min-delay-ms, ...	

Do you=
 have an idea of what is happening ? 

Thank you for you help

Michel
